'''Nalevac''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor who lived during the [[Golden Age]].
document_data.History: Nalevac developed three spells during their life. The spells they invented were ''[[color spray]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|1802|NY}}, ''[[infravision]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|1854|NY}}, and lastly, ''[[rainbow pattern]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|1895|NY}}.
